nodes.text: Roger L. Jackson (born July 13, 1956) is an accomplished voice actor, best known as the voice of Ghostface from the Scream films and as the villain Mojo-Jojo from The Powerpuff Girls.
He has provided voices for several Star Wars video and computer games, most notably providing the voice of Jedi master Echuu Shen-Jon in Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds and its expansion pack.
